0.6.4.en: Hide options for non HP23 users.

0.7.0.en: Refactored UI, add support for multiple Homeys, and support multiple insights in same graph.

0.8.0.en: Use 24h format for Charts, add view for all implemented capabilities, emphasize device/capability/insight/flow picker buttons, round insight values to log decimals.

0.8.1.en: Fixed thermostat mode issue, capability last updated, and insight null values.

0.9.0.en: Refactored editing UI to fix scrolling on mobile devices.

0.9.1.en: Fix dragging widgets on mobile devices.

0.11.2.en: Added Slider widget, custom insight colors and override titles.

0.12.0.en: Mix devices and capabilities, custom cards and views.

0.12.1.en: Fix controlling capabilities and editing dashboard links.

0.12.2.en: Fix insights crashing when resolving owner name, and auto-adjust height when displayed as card.

0.12.3.en: Fixes Insight picker get owner name.

0.13.0.en: Add widget for logic variables and dashboard background image.

0.13.2.en: Fixes exception when selecting an unconfigured variable and insights migration.

0.14.0.en: Add iframe widget, add logout button and add stepped insights for boolean values.

0.14.1.en: Fix Slider widget editor after combining CapabilityPicker.

0.15.0.en: Add insight thresholds, variable variants and bug fixes.

0.15.1.en: Fix selection not cleard while deleting widget.

0.15.4.en: Add option to login with .local and add attempt for auto-refresh.

1.0.0.en: Initial public release with dashboards and templates

1.1.0.en: Refactor editing mode and add support for cut/copy/paste widgets

1.2.0.en: Add "Add" button to open widget type dialog. This allows for adding without using drag & drop.

1.2.1.en: Fixed insight unresponsive bug and insight invalid gradient color when base should not be visible

1.3.0.en: Added readonly widget for disabling all child widgets.
